attributes.action: Provide free national transport for all people over the age of 70
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many elderly people cannot afford transport costs and so they stay at home and feel miserable.  If they could go out and meet their friends they would stay much healthier in mind and body and save health expenses for the country.  the Republic of Ireland has this benefit and it is a great success
